CustomField.description: Defines the batch size used when updating the Project Manager field from Project. The default is 2000. Consult with Certinia customer support before changing this setting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the batch size used when updating the Project Manager field from Project. The default is 2000. Consult with FinancialForce Support before changing this setting.
CustomField.label: Update Project Manager Field Batch Size
